title: 103_hr3697
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose an excise tax on: (1) each act of self-dealing between a disqualified person and a tax-exempt organization. And (2) any direct or indirect inurement of net earnings of a tax-exempt organization to the benefit of any disqualified person. Describes a disqualified person as: (1) any organization manager, (2) any family member of an organization manager, or (3) any 35-percent controlled entity of such persons.
